docs.snippet: Ben McAdoo, who was considered an innovative quarterbacks coach for Green Bay, promises to take an “up-tempo, attacking” approach as the Giants new offensive coordinator....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ben McAdoo, who was considered an innovative quarterbacks coach for Green Bay, promises to take an “up-tempo, attacking” approach as the Giants new offensive coordinator.
docs.abstract: NFL Roundup; New York Giants name Green Bay Packers assistant Ben McAdoo as their new offensive coordinator; other football news noted.

headline.main: Giants Hire Packers Assistant to Reconstruct Offense
headline.print_headline: Giants Hire Packers Assistant to Reconstruct Offense

docs.snippet: A federal judge on Tuesday did not approve the proposed $765 million settlement of the N.F.L. concussion case, saying it might not be enough to cover all of the retirees’ claims....
docs.lead_paragraph: A federal judge on Tuesday did not approve the proposed $765 million settlement of the N.F.L. concussion case, saying it might not be enough to cover all of the retirees’ claims.
docs.abstract: Federal Judge Anita B Brody rejects proposed $765 million settlement between the NFL and more than 4,500 retired players who sued the league and accused it of hiding dangers of concussion; expresses doubt that there is enough money to cover potential costs for 18,000 retirees over the 65-year life of the agreement.

headline.main: Judge Rejects N.F.L. Settlement, for Now
headline.print_headline: Judge Rejects N.F.L. Settlement, for Now

docs.snippet: The league is interested in selling the rights to several of the Thursday night games that are now shown on NFL Network....
docs.lead_paragraph: The league is interested in selling the rights to several of the Thursday night games that are now shown on NFL Network.
docs.abstract: Richard Sandomir TV Sports column analyzes NFL's plan to sell a package of Thursday night games to one of its broadcast or cable network partners; contends that relatively small deal is aimed at increasing the appeal of football on Thursday nights beyond the 72 million subscribers who have the NFL Network.

headline.main: Small Deal for N.F.L. Games Has Major Implications and Potential
headline.print_headline: Small Television Deal Has Major Implications
